fields.Title: Piloting rural nurse recruitment and retention tool at twelve critical access hospitals
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Idaho Office of Rural Health and Primary Care
fields.Description/Abstract:
2010 PI, Nursing Community Apgar Questionnaire Phase II; piloting rural nurse recruitment and retention tool at twelve critical access hospitals. Funded by Idaho Office of Rural Health & Primary Care grant for $10,000.
Modified IRB submitted and approved to complete NCAQ tool at 3 critical access hospitals as part of their quality improvement efforts. Funded for $15,000 by DHW, Idaho Office of Rural Health and Primary Care.
Partners:  DHW, Idaho Office of Rural Health and Primary Care; Critical Access Hospitals
Description of Partner:  Research results may benefit community partners and rural nurse recruitment and retention efforts throughout the state
Role:  Principal
